targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

options.content:
Engenharia Protheus

Este documento tem como objetivo organizar e centralizar todos os link necessários para a melhor administração do ambiente Protheus.

Pagina centralizadora

- Analise de Performance do ambiente Protheus - Infraestrutura para Protheus - Hardware Mínimo Recomendado

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_threads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_user")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["cpu"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dead")

panels.description: This value counts the number of milliseconds that I/O requests have waited on this block device. If there are multiple I/O requests waiting, this value will increase as the product of the number of milliseconds times the number of requests waiting (see read_time above for an example).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weighted_io_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Weighted IO Time

panels.description:
reads & writes: These values increment when an I/O request completes.

https://www.influxdata.com/integration/diskio/

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Disk Writes

panels.description:
read_bytes & write_bytes: These values count the number of bytes read from or written to this block device.

https://www.influxdata.com/integration/diskio/

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["instance"])
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
   |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Disk Writes Bytes

panels.description:
reads & writes: These values increment when an I/O request completes.

https://www.influxdata.com/integration/diskio/

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Disk Reads

panels.description:
read_bytes & write_bytes: These values count the number of bytes read from or written to this block device.

https://www.influxdata.com/integration/diskio/

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["instance"])
  |> group(columns: ["name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Disk Read Bytes

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "netstat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_established")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "netstat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_listen")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${instances}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "${bucket}",
    tag: "host",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: instances
list.name: instances
list.query:

    bucket: "${bucket}",
    tag: "host",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
